entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy and risk of freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
